title: Rebuild and redeploy the current app without feature changes

requirements.text: Rebuild and redeploy the existing application as-is (no functional changes), ensuring the frontend and backend compile successfully and the deployed app loads without runtime errors.
acceptanceCriteria: A clean build completes for both the Motoko backend canister and the React/TypeScript frontend without compilation errors.
The deployed app loads successfully in a browser and displays the Lobby screen when no nickname is set.
After setting a nickname, the Lobby Create Room and Join Room tabs render and are interactive (no disabled state due to build/runtime errors).
No uncaught exceptions appear in the browser console during initial load and basic navigation between Lobby and Room views.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.

Do not edit files under frontend/immutablePaths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; only add backend/migration.mo changes if a state upgrade is required.
nonGoals: Do not add new features or change existing user flows beyond what is required to complete a successful rebuild/redeploy.
Do not redesign UI theme or modify branding/wording unless required to resolve build/runtime failures.
